mutants.code:
from math import factorial, floor, prod
from itertools import permutations

def getKthPermutation(n, k):
    numbers = list(range(1, n + 1))
    permutation = ''
    k += 1
    while n > 0:
        n -= 1
        index = k // factorial(n)
        k %= factorial(n)
        permutation += str(numbers[index])
        numbers.remove(numbers[index])
    return permutation

from math import factorial, floor, prod
from itertools import permutations

def getKthPermutation(n, k):
    numbers = list(range(1, n + 1))
    permutation = 'MUTATED'
    k -= 1
    while n > 0:
        n -= 1
        index = k // factorial(n)
        k %= factorial(n)
        permutation += str(numbers[index])
        numbers.remove(numbers[index])
    return permutation
